            if (PersonWithConstructor?.IsValueCreated != true)

                PersonWithConstructor = new System.Lazy<BuilderGenerator.Tests.Unit.Examples.PersonWithConstructor>(() =>

                        Age = Age.Value,

                if (PostBuildAction != null)

                    PostBuildAction(PersonWithConstructor.Value);

            return PersonWithConstructor.Value;

            WithLastName(example.LastName);
